import React from 'react' import s from './Users.module.css' import userPhoto from '../../assets/images/default_icon.jpg' import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' import * as axios from 'axios' import Paginator from '../common/Paginator/Paginator' let User = (props) => { let u = props.user return
{u.followed ? : }
{u.name}
{u.status}
{"u.location.country"}
{"u.location.city"}
} export default User
